member.name: T:TankSim.Client.OperatorModules.OperatorModuleFactory`1
member.summary: Magic factory for loading operator modules from execution context at runtime. Searches execution process for implementations with defined. Maps operator role to tagged modules. Instantiates modules on-demand when a role is requested.
